de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.server.databasecommunication

Class UserManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.server.databasecommunication.UserManagement

  • public class UserManagement
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the User registration and login. I creates database entries for new users.
    Author:
    Alexander Brennecke

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> register(User newUser)
        This method registers a new user to the database. But only if the username and the eMail doens't exist in the database.
        Parameters:
        newUser - a User object of the new user
        Returns:
        a HashMap with registry information.
        See Also:
        /F0011/

      • login

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> login(User user)
        This method is called to log a user in. It compares the user name and the password.
        Parameters:
        user - a User Object for the user, who wants to login
        Returns:
        a HashMap with information about the existence of the username and the correct password.
        See Also:
        /F0020/

      • getUserValues

        public User getUserValues(java.lang.String userName)
        This mehtod maps all information of the given user to a new User object and returns it.
        Parameters:
        userName - is used to find the information in the database and to map it to the User Object.
        Returns:
        a new User object with the mapped parameters.

      • getUserName

        public java.lang.String getUserName(int managerID)
        Searches in the database for the User, that owns the Manager with the given ID
        Parameters:
        managerID - the ID of one of the managers, the wanted user owns.
        Returns:
        the name of the User, that owns a Manager with the given ID.
